args: for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %i in (`"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft Visual Studio\Installer\vswhere.exe" -latest -products * -requires Microsoft.VisualStudio.Component.VC.Tools.x86.x64 -property installationPath`) do "%i\Common7\Tools\VsDevCmd.bat"

& { $inst = & "${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\Microsoft Visual Studio\Installer\vswhere.exe" -latest -products * -requires Microsoft.VisualStudio.Component.VC.Tools.x86.x64 -property installationPath; if(-not $inst){ Write-Output 'vswhere not found or no VS install'; return }; $launch = Join-Path $inst 'Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1'; if(Test-Path $launch){ & $launch } else { $vsdev = Join-Path $inst 'Common7\Tools\VsDevCmd.bat'; if(Test-Path $vsdev){ cmd /k ""$vsdev"" } else { Write-Output "No launcher found under $inst" } } }
